price: Ni igiti gishibuka mu ndiba y’umuriro ugurumana.
arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٞ تَخۡرُجُ فِيٓ أَصۡلِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: innahā shajaratun takhruju fī aṣli al-jaḥīmi
